p: Median joining evolutionary network was created to identify mutations of the E gene sequences in the similarly clustered sequences of DENV-2 cosmopolitan Clade Ib genotype to identify and visualize the mutation pattern using the Network 4.6.1 software. The resulted evolutionary network was visualized in S3 Fig. Comparative sequence analysis between the generated DNEV-2 sequences from the mosquito pools and Singapore isolates (2013–17) revealed that the Sri Lankan sequence (SL1) grouped with a sub-clade of clade Ib viruses (variant 3; fixed substitutions—C1383T + T1464C). The genetic relationship of clade Ib viruses between the two countries has been summarized in the following table ( Table 4).
